column1: Therefore, on evaluating the weight of the evidence the submissions made by the
counsel for the Appellants do not have any merit or worth.
Therefore, I too see no reasons whatsoever to depart from the said decision.
identification of the Appellants at the scene. As stated above,  it is my opinion
that the Appellants from the 1st to 5th had been adequately identified. Therefore,
I see no reason to set aside the judgment of the Court of Appeal.
